port.title: HTTP Server Port
port.description: The port number for the HTTP server. Must be between 1 and 65535.

maxStationaryDistance.title: Max Stationary Distance
maxStationaryDistance.description: The maximum distance a device should monitor, in centimeters.

minStationarySignal.title: Min Stationary Signal
minStationarySignal.description: The minimum stationary signal should considered as presence (between 0 and 100).

maxMovingDistance.title: Max Moving Distance
maxMovingDistance.description: The maximum distance a device should monitor, in centimeters.

minMovingSignal.title: Min Moving Signal
minMovingSignal.description: The minimum moving signal should considered as presence (between 0 and 100).

noMotionDelay.title: No Motion Delay
noMotionDelay.description: The delay in seconds to consider a device as not moving.
